briefdescription.para: Make callback to a function (including lambdas) with a context pointer to any object on this node.

detaileddescription.para: One must ensure that the lifetime of context pointer provided to the callback persists at least as long as the last time the callback might be invoked. Example snippet:

parameterdescription.para: pointer to the object context passed to callback function
endpoint function that takes a message and context pointer

briefdescription.para: Make a void callback to a function (including lambdas) with a context pointer to any object on this node.

detaileddescription.para: One must ensure that the lifetime of context pointer provided to the callback persists at least as long as the last time the callback might be invoked. Example snippet:

endpoint function that takes a context pointer

briefdescription.para: Make a void callback to a function (including lambdas) on this node.
Make a callback to a active message handler to be invoked on a certain node with a message.
Make a callback to a particular collection element invoking a non-intrusive collection active function handler.
Make a callback to a particular collection element invoking an intrusive collection member handler.
Make a callback to a particular objgroup element (node) invoking a objgroup member handler.
Make a callback to a active message handler with a message to be broadcast to all nodes.
Make a callback to a whole collection invoking a non-intrusive collection active function handler.
Make a callback to a whole collection invoking an intrusive collection member handler.
Make a callback to a whole objgroup invoking a objgroup member handler.
Trigger and send back on a pipe that is not locally triggerable and thus requires communication if it is "sent" off-node.

briefdescription.para: Core VT component that provides an interface to create type-erased callbacks to many endpoint types.

detaileddescription.para: Allows creation of callback to many types of handlers with different modeslike send and broadcast.
